overages.subheader: Upgrade anytime or add coverage. You’ll always see what each workflow used before you hit a limit.

usageExplainerModal.title: How usage works
usageExplainerModal.body:
Markitbot includes monthly usage so you can run day-to-day tasks without surprises.

• Core meters track platform activity (pageviews, chats, contacts, compliance checks, and refresh jobs).
• Agent meters track intelligence and monitoring:
  – Intel Runs = finished outputs (snapshots, summaries, reports, alerts)
  – Market Sensors = your watchlist (menus/URLs monitored)

Most customers just enable playbooks (daily snapshot, weekly report, lead follow-up). We track usage automatically and show warnings before you hit a limit.

menuPageviews.label: Menu/Pageviews
menuPageviews.tooltipShort: Visits to your menu and SEO pages.
menuPageviews.tooltipLong: Counts each time someone loads a Markitbot-hosted menu or SEO page. Helps you track discovery and visibility.
whatCounts: A page load of a headless menu page
A page load of an SEO page (city/ZIP/brand/dispensary)

smokeySessions.label: Ember Sessions
smokeySessions.tooltipLong: Counts each customer session where Ember provides recommendations or guidance. A session can include multiple messages.
whatCounts: A session that returns after the inactivity window (configurable)
whatDoesNotCount: Internal testing sessions (if flagged as internal)
Page loads without a chat session

deeboChecks.label: Sentinel Checks
deeboChecks.tooltipLong: Counts each time content is checked against jurisdiction + channel rules (web, email, SMS). Used across Drip, Ember, and publishing.
whatCounts: Checking a page draft before publishing
Checking an email/SMS draft before sending
Checking a template variant (each unique version counts)
whatDoesNotCount: Minor formatting changes that reuse the same exact content hash (optional optimization)

contactsStored.label: Contacts Stored
contactsStored.tooltipShort: Leads and customers saved in your workspace.
contactsStored.tooltipLong: Counts unique contacts stored in your Markitbot workspace for follow-ups, reporting, and audience building.
whatCounts: A new unique contact (email or phone) saved
A lead form submission creating a contact

syncRuns.label: Sync Runs
syncRuns.tooltipLong: Counts each time Markitbot refreshes menus, catalogs, or connected sources. Used for keeping pages and agents up to date.

intelRuns.label: Intel Runs
intelRuns.tooltipLong: Counts each intelligence output created by the Agent Workspace—daily snapshots, weekly summaries, alert batches, footprint audits, and KPI reports.
intelRuns.uiHint: Think of an Intel Run as “one finished report.”
whatCounts: An alert batch (e.g., “top changes since yesterday”)
A scheduled KPI report or audit

marketSensors.label: Market Sensors
marketSensors.tooltipLong: Counts each monitored menu/URL/retailer we track for changes during the month. Used by Radar and intelligence snapshots.
marketSensors.uiHint: Sensors are your watchlist. More sensors = wider coverage.
whatCounts: Each monitored listing URL (Leafly/marketplace pages) if configured
whatDoesNotCount: Reports that reuse existing monitoring data

craig.name: Drip (Marketing Automation)
craig.blurb: Automated email + SMS workflows with compliance pre-checks. Great for claim-to-lead nurture and lifecycle journeys.
craig.tooltip: Uses Contacts Stored + Sentinel Checks. Optional Intel Runs for performance summaries.

pops.name: Pulse (Analytics + Forecasting)
pops.blurb: Dashboards, cohorts, and decision-ready reporting across traffic → clicks → claims → outcomes.
pops.tooltip: Uses Intel Runs to generate reports. May use Sync Runs to refresh data before reporting.

ezal.name: Radar (Competitive Intelligence)
ezal.blurb: Market Sensors track menus and pricing changes, then summarize what matters (price moves, promos, availability shifts).
ezal.tooltip: Uses Market Sensors for monitoring + Intel Runs for summaries and alerts.

deeboPro.name: Sentinel Pro (Compliance OS)
deeboPro.blurb: Jurisdiction-aware rule packs, audit trails, and pre-flight checks across web + email + SMS.
deeboPro.tooltip: Uses Sentinel Checks across web, email, and SMS. Adds audit trails and jurisdiction rule packs.
